data.deskripsi_posisi:
Deskripsi : 
Bertanggung jawab untuk mendukung pencapaian bisnis cabang Bank Mandiri dengan melakukan mapping dan eksekusi potensi bisnis di wilayah sekitar Cabang sesuai strategi Bank. 

Tugas & Tanggung Jawab: 
- Meningkatan ekosistem digital Bank Mandiri melalui edukasi dan pemasaran digital transaction product, seperti Livin', Kopra, Livin' Merchant, dan EDC Bank Mandiri
- Mendukung peningkatkan CASA (Current Account & Saving Account) baik dari nasabah eksisting maupun nasabah new to Bank
- Mendukung pertumbuhan ekonomi pada sektor usaha kecil dan menengah melalui referal kredit mikro
- Mendukung peningkatan akses layanan keuangan masyarakat melalui kegiatan promosi dan akuisisi Produk Bank
- Mendukung kegiatan operasional cabang terkait dengan administrasi, dokumentasi dan pengarsipan
- Menjaga kerahasiaan data nasabah dan informasi Bank sesuai dengan kode etik dan regulasi 

Kriteria:
- WNI
- ⁠Fresh graduate atau satu tahun setelah lulus
- ⁠S1 dari reputable university min. Akreditasi A/Unggul
- ⁠S1 min. IPK 3,00 dan S2 min. IPK 3,25
- ⁠S1 usia max. 24 dan S2 usia max. 26

data.deskripsi_posisi: We are offering an internship opportunity for a motivated trilingual translator who is fluent in Chinese, English, and Indonesian. The intern will assist our team in translating documents, business communications, and technical materials between the three languages. You will also help with meeting interpretation, report writing, and proofreading bilingual or trilingual content. This position is ideal for students or fresh graduates who wish to gain real-world translation experience in an international business environment. Candidates should have strong language skills, attention to detail, and a willingness to learn professional translation standards. Familiarity with business, trade, or mining terminology is an advantage but not required. During the internship, you will have the chance to improve your translation accuracy, develop cross-cultural communication skills, and build a strong foundation for a professional career in multilingual translation.

data.deskripsi_posisi: We are looking for two Civil Engineering students to join our team as interns. This internship offers valuable hands-on experience in real project environments and company operations. The selected interns will assist our engineers and management team in various activities, including site visits, field surveys, data collection, and preparing technical and business reports. You will also help create presentation materials and project summary slides (PPT) for internal meetings and client updates. This position is ideal for university students who want to gain practical exposure to both engineering and business operations. Candidates should be responsible, detail-oriented. Basic computer and PowerPoint skills are required. During the internship, you will have the opportunity to learn project coordination, report writing, and professional communication in a real engineering company environment.

data.deskripsi_posisi: We are looking for an enthusiastic Marketing Intern to join our team and support daily business and client communication activities. The ideal candidate should be a university student majoring in Marketing or Business Administration, fluent in English and Indonesian, and passionate about learning how to connect companies with clients. The intern will assist in communicating with customers, preparing marketing materials, coordinating meetings, and helping the company build and maintain client relationships. You will also help identify potential business opportunities and support the management team in achieving marketing goals. This internship is an excellent opportunity to gain real experience in international business communication and marketing operations. Candidates should be proactive, responsible, and have good communication and teamwork skills. During the internship, you will develop your ability to handle client interactions, understand market needs, and contribute to real business negotiations.

data.deskripsi_posisi: Content Writer bertugas menulis dan mengembangkan konten edukatif serta promosi untuk media sosial dan website perusahaan, melakukan riset topik hukum dan isu terkini, menyusun caption serta artikel yang menarik, bekerja sama dengan tim desain dan marketing, serta memastikan seluruh konten sesuai dengan gaya komunikasi dan tujuan branding perusahaan.

data.deskripsi_posisi:
1.Membuat animasi 2D atau 3D berkualitas tinggi untuk kebutuhan konten digital, iklan, media sosial, film, maupun proyek internal perusahaan.
2.Mengembangkan storyboard, konsep visual, dan alur gerak berdasarkan creative brief.
3.Menerjemahkan ilustrasi, karakter, dan elemen grafis menjadi rangkaian animasi yang menarik.
4.Bekerja sama dengan tim kreatif—termasuk desainer, copywriter, dan video editor—untuk memastikan konsistensi visual.
